nodes.text: A small Imperial outpost on Naboo's swamp moon of Rori was in operation by the Galactic Empire during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The facility was guarded by a number of Imperial Army troopers and staffed by a Surface Marshal. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, a spacer visited the outpost to recover a scout trooper armor utility belt.
The Imperial outpost on Rori was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
